title: Bug 116786 Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the library include. It should store the relative path instead.
SR:
To reproduce this bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the report design
2. Navigate to the library include section
3. Change the absolute path to a relative path
4. Save the report design
5. Verify that the relative path is correctly stored in the library include section
